11.16.16  6:06 pm   Dear William of the Wurtz clan, I am writing to you on this wonderful autumn evening with a desire, and that desire is to receive information. Before I state what the information i seek is, i would like to provide a small amount of knowledge. There is a page on this very website known as "reality". Upon the first viewing of that website, a screen is shown that says "what's the password". I, as well as many others who are like me, click on the button that says " I don't know" I am seeking the password, as I am very interested in what may lie beyond that wall. I believe that the world will be a better, more loving place if you would disclose this to the public. I am aware that this article may not be publicly displayed on this section of your web page, but I do ask that it may. With love, {Z}

9.5.16  2:52 pm   Hi Bill, I would like to talk to you concerning your "history of japan" video. Why have you glossed over the atrocities Japan has committed, which are major events in Japan's history? Examples include the Rape of Nanking, the South Korean Comfort Women, and the human testing conducted on Chinese civilians. These are important issues that cannot be forgotten. However, they are not present at all in your video, which has been viewed over 16 million times. This is encouraging the ignorance of the "darker side" of Japan's history. While countries such as Germany have deeply apologized for their war atrocities and engrain these events in teaching history to their students, the Japanese government has refused to apologize and Japanese textbooks are being revised to omit these events. I sincerely believe that you are a very learned and good person, thus I hope that you are aware of this and that with your large following and outreach, I hope that you may also raise awareness of this issue. Japan's war atrocities are not to be glossed over.
